resources.string:
Feeling hungry and bored!
Try our Stir Fried Chinese Chicken at just 800ksh!
 Prepared with Brown rice, pepper, garlic, ginger, yellow pepper, beef, chicken breast, olive oil
Get the Chinese Fried rice at 300KES lower\n promo valid till 3rd of August
Get 3 burgers for the price of two\n with a 200ml soda and coleslaw
Get 5 spicy wings for the price of one every Friday\n promo valid till 9pm

Get a full meal of chips, chicken, ginger sauce and\n a bottle of water every Sunday offer valid from 9am-12pm
We are friendly and willing to chat. Reach out to us at anytime, we are happy to respond to you. Contact Us\n
